root_cause: Workflow expectations are not documented in project docs.
proposed_fix: Define the BugMgmt workflow and required fields in Phase 01 docs.
qa_reproduction: Review BugMgmt docs and confirm the workflow steps are not defined.
close_note: Workflow expectations are now captured in the BugMgmt Phase 01 docs and process guidelines.

summary: Details column does not display the correct details in the BugMgmt UI
root_cause: Details column only rendered optional fields and skipped the summary.
proposed_fix: Render Summary by default and only show optional fields when provided; fall back to date when opened_at is missing.
qa_reproduction: Open UI/bugmgmt_issues.html and confirm the Details column shows Summary for each issue.
close_note: UI now renders Summary and only shows detail lines when values exist; opened date falls back to date field.

summary: No per-issue detail view on click in BugMgmt UI
root_cause: UI only lists issues in a table without a dedicated detail panel.
proposed_fix: Add a detail panel that renders a selected issue when a table row is clicked.
qa_reproduction: Open UI/bugmgmt_issues.html and click an issue row; no dedicated detail view appears.
close_note: Per-issue detail panel renders on row click in BugMgmt UI.

summary: Document how to add new stages
root_cause: Process docs do not explain how to add stages.
proposed_fix: Add explicit stage-creation steps and examples to the process docs.
qa_reproduction: Attempt to add a stage using the docs and confirm the steps are unclear.
close_note: Stage creation steps and naming conventions are documented in the process guidelines.

summary: PM links column is not clickable because row click navigation intercepts anchor clicks
root_cause: The row-level click handler triggers navigation on any click within the row, including clicks on nested anchors.
proposed_fix: Ignore clicks originating from links or stop propagation on anchor clicks so link targets open as expected.
qa_reproduction: Open AI_first/ui/PM.html and click the Summary link in a project row; it navigates to the row target instead of the Summary page.
close_note: Row click handler now ignores anchor clicks so link targets open as expected.

summary: PM header action buttons overflow on narrow screens
root_cause: The header badges container does not allow wrapping, so buttons overflow when the viewport narrows.
proposed_fix: Allow flex wrapping on the badges container and adjust spacing so buttons wrap cleanly.
qa_reproduction: Open AI_first/ui/PM.html and narrow the browser; header buttons overflow or compress instead of wrapping.
close_note: Header badges now wrap to prevent overflow on narrow screens.

summary: User Docs rows show pointer cursor even though they are not clickable
root_cause: The global table row style sets cursor:pointer for all tables, even those without row navigation.
proposed_fix: Apply the pointer cursor only to rows that have data-link or a dedicated clickable class.
qa_reproduction: Hover over rows in the User Docs Hub table on AI_first/ui/PM.html; the cursor implies a click but no action occurs.
close_note: Pointer cursor and hover are limited to rows with data-link or data-id.
